ol.li:
Contains zero or more [0..*] addr
Patient address (NEMSIS EPatient.05-10)

Contains zero or more [0..*] telecom
Patient telephone (NEMSIS EPatient.18)

Contains zero or one [0..1] patient, where its type is EMS Patient
Contains exactly one [1..1] EMS Patient
